column4: hello, does anyone know how to ftp to another computer using gFTP>
hey does anyone know how to ftp to another computer?
ftp://user:pass@computername
you need the "pass" in there?
if it is anonymous access, then just ftp://computername
it works fine for me, so probably there is something else wrong
it needs an ftp server...
if the other pc is yours too, install sshd on that machine and use sftp://computername to watch it
ok, that program sets up an ftp server?
ok, i've installed the ssh, but I can't connect to the other computer
have you installed openssh-server on the other computer?
wait do I need the computer name?
or the user name
sftp://username@computername
or sftp://username@ip-adress
is there a way to find out the computer name?
just try its ip address
ok sure thanks
Sorry, how can I find out the ip address of that computer?
on the other computer type: ifconfig
thanks
it's saying there's no such file or directory
hey, it's saying there's no such file or directory, am I doing this right?
